Miscellaneous Highlights: Cleveland held off the hosts and improved to a franchise-record 9-0 via a 131-122 victory.
Willie Green, Zion Williamson (29 points), and Jose Alvarado (27 points, 7/7 three-point shooting) provided postgame video reaction.
Others: The Pelicans will travel to Orlando this morning and practice in Central Florida later today.
New Orleans visits the Magic (3-6) at 6 p.m. Friday (GCSEN, WWL).
New Orleans will be off Saturday, then practice Sunday afternoon in the Ochsner Sports Performance Center.
